message: Let's start with a fair-ish deal. I take most of the money now, but we can adjust in later rounds.
I'm taking a bigger share this round, but still leaving you a significant amount. Your turn to think!

I'm feeling generous, but this is my final offer.  We need to come to an agreement before the money is worth nothing.
